price: Siku watapo sukumwa kwenye Moto kwa msukumo wa nguvu,
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
footnotes: Siku watakapo sukumwa kuingizwa Motoni kwa nguvu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma yudaʿʿūna ilā nāri jahannama daʿʿan
